home.discription: #1 Maximizing ROI with Proven Expertise in BTB and BTC Marketing

about.description: As a senior media buyer, I am passionate about helping businesses grow and achieve their goals through effective advertising and marketing strategies. With over 3 years and a half of experience in the field, I have worked across a range of industries, including real estate lead generation, cosmetics, clothes, gym, and e-commerce in the tech industry in Saudi Arabia

Contact.contant_description1: I will read all emails. Send me any message you want and I'll get back to you.
Contact.contant_description2: I need your Name and Email Address, but you won't receive anything other than your reply.
Contact.contact_social-description-2: Write me on my social networks

Experience_list.title: GoAraby Digital Marketing Agency Dubai (Senior Performance Media Buyer)
points: I lead the planning and execution of digital marketing campaigns on platforms like social media and Google Ads.
Design targeted strategies to meet client goals, leveraging market insights.
Campaign Management & Optimization: Oversee and adjust social media and Google Ads campaigns to maximize performance.
Website Analysis: Analyze client websites to identify improvements that enhance user experience and conversions.
Client Collaboration: Conduct monthly performance reviews and plan future campaigns with clients.
Content & Design Oversight: Create compelling ad copy and collaborate with designers to ensure brand alignment.

Experience_list.title: Taif Al Almas Trading est (Senior media buyer)
points: creating and implementing advertising campaigns across a range of digital platforms, including Google Ads, Snapchat Ads, Instagram, and TikTok.
crafting compelling ad content that resonates with our target audience and developing strategies that maximize ROI and drive business growth.
write blog content for our company website, helping to establish our brand as a thought leader in the e-commerce industry.

Experience_list.title: Media Bubble (media buyer)
points: creating online content, commissioning freelance copywriters.
driving brand awareness, and coordinating digital marketing campaigns.

Experience_list.title: 10D Digital Marketing Agency (Junior Media Buyer)
points: Help identify target audiences and plan media campaigns Compare and negotiate rates, ad space.
airtime Optimize plans and budgets according to the best media.
mix Prepare schedules and adjust when needed Experiment with new platforms and channels.
Ensure ads are creative and displayed appropriately Monitor costs and return on investment (ROI) Report to clients and build long-term relationships

Experience_list.title: OTM Marketing Agency (Digital Marketing Specialist)
points: helping maintain a brand by working on marketing campaigns.
performing market research, strategizing with other marketing professionals.
creating content to aid in the success of marketing campaign.

Skill_list: Monitor costs and return on investment (ROI)
